Featured.Title: The Irishman
Featured.Description: The film follows Frank Sheeran (De Niro), a truck driver who becomes a hitman involved with mobster Russell Bufalino (Pesci) and his crime family before later working for the powerful Teamster Jimmy Hoffa (Pacino).

TendingNow.Title: Buzz Lightyear
TendingNow.Description: Buzz Lightyear is the deuteragonist of the Disneyâ€¢Pixar Toy Story franchise. He is a heroic spaceman action figure originally belonging to Andy Davis. Depicted as a Space Ranger working under the authority of the Star Command, Buzz was created during a time where astronauts were especially popular amongst children

TendingNow.Title: The promise
TendingNow.Description: The plot is about a love triangle that develops between Mikael (Isaac), an Armenian medical student, Chris (Bale), an American journalist, and Ana (Le Bon), an Armenian-born woman raised in France, immediately before and during the Armenian genocide. April 21, 2017 (U.S.)

TendingNow.Title: Good Doctor
TendingNow.Description: An ambitious anxious young doctor eager to impress his superiors and colleagues steps in when an 18-year-old patient Diane is admitted for a kidney infection Dr. Martin getting the much-needed boost of self-esteem he craves.

TendingNow.Title: Retaliation
TendingNow.Description: Fueled by anger, a demolition worker seeks revenge against the man he holds responsible for a traumatic childhood incident.

TendingNow.Title: Harry Potter
TendingNow.Description: The story begins when 11-year-old orphan Harry discovers that his parents were wizards and he starts his education in magic at Hogwart's School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. There he makes two close friends, Ron and Hermione, who share his adventures

TendingNow.Title: Hannibal
TendingNow.Description: A sequel to the 1991 film The Silence of the Lambs, the plot follows disgraced FBI special agent Clarice Starling as she attempts to apprehend cannibalistic serial killer Hannibal Lecter before his surviving victim, Mason Verger, captures him.

TendingNow.Title: Joker and Harley
TendingNow.Description: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harley Quinn, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital.

TendingNow.Title: Star Wars
TendingNow.Description: The Star Wars franchise depicts the adventures of characters a long time ago in a galaxy far far across multiple fictional eras, in which humans and many species of aliens (often humanoid) co-exist with droids, which may be programmed for personal assistance or battle

TendingNow.Title: Avengers Assemble
TendingNow.Description: Marvel's Avengers Assemble is an American animated television series based on the fictional Marvel Comics superhero team the Avengers. It is the third series to feature the Avengers after The Avengers: United They Stand and The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes.

TendingNow.Title: Drive
TendingNow.Description: Driver is a skilled Hollywood stuntman who moonlights as a getaway driver for criminals. Though he projects an icy exterior, lately he's been warming up to a pretty neighbor named Irene and her young son, Benicio. When Irene's husband gets out of jail, he enlists Driver's help in a million-dollar heist.

TendingNow.Title: Capone
TendingNow.Description: Synopsis Once a ruthless businessman and bootlegger who ruled Chicago with an iron fist, Alfonse Capone was the most infamous and feared gangster of American lore. At the age of 47, following nearly a decade of imprisonment, dementia rots Alfonse's mind and his past becomes present.

TendingNow.Title: The Gentlemens
TendingNow.Description: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.
